reviews.title: Mmmm, so soft!
reviews.review_text: I love how these wipes leave my skin feeling so soft. They are large enough that I tear them in half and get twice the amount of use from one package. Package opens and closes easily. My dermatologist recommended Cerave products and this one's a winner!

reviews.title: Cerave
reviews.review_text: This product works well and has not bothered my sensitive skin. Highly recommend!
My wife says it works makes her skin feel silky smooth
I'm excited to have a cleansing wipe that is approved for composting. CeraVe products make my skin feel good.
These wipes are great! Very gentle on skin but work really well removing makeup. Also, it doesn't leave skin feeling tight or over dry.
Love Cerave products, packaging should be a little more secure so they don't dry out. I'll probably get a baby wipe hardsided container to store them in.
While I like the product, the dispenser does not work. This is the 2nd time I have ordered this same product and the dispenser is broken. Won't buy this again.

reviews.title: OILY
reviews.review_text: WAY too oily. If you are naturally oily. DO NOT use these. They might even be too oily for dry skin. The oil is hard to was off hands and face

reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
reviews.review_text: Don't recommend this product due to the amount of wipes you get for the price. Also, the scent smells weird.

reviews.title: Best facial wipes ever
reviews.review_text: I love this makeup remover! It removers makeup better than any wipe I've ever used. And very gentle on my sensitive skin! I'm very happy I tried it!

reviews.title: Good product, had been opened
reviews.review_text: The product is great. When package arrive it had been opened (like someone had taken a wipe out). Gross.

reviews.title: Not a winner.
reviews.review_text: These are are somehow both dry %26 greasy. I have very sensitive skin, %26 thankfully they don't give me any redness or breakouts. The makeup removal quality is lacking though bc of the dryness that doesn't want to pick up the makeup %26 I find that I have to be a bit more aggressive with them, which in turn leaves me feeling like I'm doing more damage than good. They also have a slightly greasy after effect that does not feel pleasing.
Great product…..removes make-up without aggravating my sensitive skin.
This is an amazing product I have used for years dermatologist recommended.
That are the only face wipes I have tried that don't make my face itch

reviews.title: CeraVe face wipes
reviews.review_text: Great quality. Cleans all make up without residue. Face feels clean. No breakouts or issue. Will buy again

reviews.title: Avoid delivery
reviews.review_text: It has gotten so bad. Never get items. Taken to wrong house. Not worth annual cost of Walmart anymore Totally not mg house in pic - AGAIN
I love these make up remover wipes. Most wipes like this leave my face feeling dry but these make my skin feel hydrated and clean.

reviews.title: Good purchase!
reviews.review_text: I've used several brands of makeup wipes and I find these to be the best! They don't bother my eyes near as much as other brands.

reviews.title: New fav
reviews.review_text: Nice big size, no real scent, takes off even waterproof makeup very well. Says “normal to dry” but great for my combo skin. The only reason not 5 stars: price per wipe a bit high, as only 25 in pkg, unlike other products i have used which typically have 30 and cost a little less.

reviews.title: Just as advertised
reviews.review_text: I really like these because they don't soak my face and they don't leave a residue. They also don't feel drying. I'm just left with a clean feeling. I use these in the morning, so not to strip off all the good nighttime moisturizer I put on and for a quick light clean.

reviews.title: Terrible Smell
reviews.review_text: These use to be a favorite. I have thrown 3 packs out, which is not cheap. My recent purchases smell like horse pee, or fish. Very foul. I have developed corneal edema, and I'm trying to determine if it's from these wipes. The eye issues started the same time the wipes had a foul odor.

I am very sensitive when it comes to makeup removing wipes. I used another brand for a long time but they changed something in the formula that made my eyes burn every time I used them. I love these CeraVe wipes! They help clean the makeup off but also leave my face feeling hydrated and refreshed. I would definitely recommend for anyone with sensitive skin or eyes.

I liked this product. In that it is a Cera ve product I thought it would be good. I personally like a nice soft scent to products which this one doesn't have hence the 4 stars. I do get why companies don't scent products as some people can be sensitive to scents. I liked the product %26 would recommend it.

reviews.title: 7 year olds make up
reviews.review_text: I purchased these for my 7 year old to use on her face after she has played with makeup. I like the Cerave products for myself and assumed they would work for her also. They haven't dried out her face and are easy to use, along with a convenient size.

reviews.title: Game-Changer for My Skincare Routine
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleansing Makeup Remover Wipes! These plant-based face wash wipes have become an essential part of my skincare routine. They effortlessly remove makeup, dirt, and impurities, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed. The fact that they're plant-based is a huge bonus, as I appreciate products that are gentle on both my skin and the environment. These wipes are super hydrating, which is fantastic for my dry skin. I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture and hydration since I started using them. They're also incredibly convenient for on-the-go use or late nights when I'm too tired for a full skincare routine. Overall, I give these wipes a solid 5 stars for their effectiveness, eco-friendliness, and skin-friendly ingredients. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: make up remover
reviews.review_text: product is good on my face. no issues with shipping and handling
Love these, they keep your face clear from debris and moisturized
Best advice my dermatologist has ever gave me love it

reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitive skin, this is the makeup remover wipe you need in your life. From lotion to these makeup wipes, Cera Ve is my go to brand for my sensitive skin. These have never caused negative results to my facial skin, and they are just as good, or better, than the top makeup remover wipes. I definitely recommend these.
I tried these instead of washing my face with the Cereve hydrating soap. This has changed my routine for the better. Much faster and my skin looks great.

reviews.title: Horrible Smell
reviews.review_text: How is everyone not talking about the AWFUL smell?! I can't even use them. They make me gag and the smell sticks to my face. It smells like horse manure. I'm having to throw them in the trash, I just cant take it

reviews.title: Hydrating
reviews.review_text: These make-up remover wipes clean the face effectively leaving a hydrating barrier on the skin. There is no need to wash your face after cleaning. The oily type feeling does dissipate after a few minutes and leaves your skin soft.

reviews.title: I'm wouldn't buy these again
reviews.review_text: These wipes aren't very moist and they really irritate my skin. They pulled my eyelash extensions out so be careful around your eyes if you have eyelash extensions.

reviews.title: Work great! Occasional odd smell
reviews.review_text: These work great. I do occasionally get a pack that has an odd smell. Not bad really, just weird compared to the normal smell. I assume it's from how it's shipped/stored.

reviews.title: Love the way it makes my skin feel and look
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best make up removal wipes I have ever used. It's so gentle on the skin, doesn't make my face feel sticky afterwards. My face feels so much more refreshed after using. I have been combining this with the CeraVe Hydrating Toner.

reviews.title: Gentle and effective
reviews.review_text: My family has extremely sensitive skin. When my daughter started theater, she needed something to remove makeup, gently. After trying several brands, these were the winner.

reviews.title: Good for my skin but so expensive!
reviews.review_text: These leave my skin feeling soft %26 smooth but it does take 3 to take all of my make up off. I'm going to check out the Cetaphil wipes %26 see if they're as good. These are lovely but so pricey. Even at Walmart.

reviews.title: Gentle %26 thorough cleansing.
reviews.review_text: Gently cleansing cloth that cleans without being harsh on the skin. These cloths are soft and leave skin feeling clean, even removes mascara without being abrasive.

reviews.title: Vegan, yet not cruelty-free
reviews.review_text: I thought since these facial wipes are plant based (VEGAN), that they'd also be cruelty-free. I found out online that NOT cruelty-free. They still use animals. I purchased elsewhere

reviews.title: No complaints
reviews.review_text: I have naturally oily skin and I've learned just for me that I need to work with it instead of against it and these wipes, help me clean my face after a day of make up without it feeling dry, or overly oily

reviews.title: Horrible smell
reviews.review_text: These have a horrible smell and leave a greasy film on your face. I wanted to love them because of the brand and they weren't cheap! I purchased online, wanted a refund but not enough to take them into the store.

reviews.title: TRUTH
reviews.review_text: These wipes are nothing short than perfect. They are so moisturizing and actually remove my lip stain effortlessly. This is my night time treat routine. Customer for life.

reviews.title: Most Moisturizing
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many makeup wipes, and this one far and away leaves your skin the most moisturized. Never broken out after using it either, and my skin is sensitive.
There okay they don't take my mascara off which is why I bought them but there good for the rest of the face and leaving a dewy hydrating feel on the face

reviews.title: Excellent product
reviews.review_text: I have used these for years and very pleased with them. They are easy to use and an excellent product. The las ones I ordered were open and half were gone. Returned to store with no hassle. A little expensive for only 25.

reviews.title: Very pleased.
reviews.review_text: Love these!! Only makeup wipes I will use. I have sensitive skin and they aren't harsh on my face. No burning if it gets in your eyes. Doesn't create redness. Highly recommend if you have sensitive skin or struggle with rosacea.

reviews.title: Great Plant Based Makeup Remover Wipes
reviews.review_text: I like these makeup remover wipes because they are moist and remove my makeup easily. The plant based ingredients are refreshing and soothing to my skin. I highly recommend these face wipes.

reviews.title: Refreshing
reviews.review_text: These leave your skin feeling alive, cleansed and refreshed. It's my favorite - in a hurry or not it does exactly what it says. My skin feels and looks great! You won't regret it!
Oh - I Love these! They are Good to use just about every day, I also have the Cleanser, which I Absolutely LOVE...........my face has Never felt So CLEAN !! :)

reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for makeup wipes that would work for my sensitive skin. Other brands typically leave me with a burning feeling. So far after about 10 uses I have not had any burning or uncomfortable feelings. One wipe will get my makeup off for an everyday makeup look. Full glam takes 2 wipes. I do wish the packaging was more secure and sealed closed. I'd give this product a 4.5 stars. Other than that I am happy with these makeup wipes.

reviews.title: Great everyday wipes: gentle, effective, and don't
reviews.review_text: I really like these wipes! They're super gentle and don't leave my skin feeling tight or dry. They take off all my makeup - even mascara, without rubbing too much. They smell nice and clean, not too strong, and they don't sting my eyes at all. Plus, it's cool that they're plant-based. The pack closes well too, so the wipes don't dry out. Summary: perfect for preparing skin for the next steps.

reviews.title: Nice and clean product
reviews.review_text: These CeraVe make up remover wipes are amazing! They are soft, they remove waterproof makeup products, and they don't cause breakouts. Love them!

reviews.title: Perfect for my sensitive skin!!!
reviews.review_text: I love using Cerave facial wipes. My pores feel open and my skin feels so soft, clean, and hydrated after using it.

reviews.title: Bad smell
reviews.review_text: This had a really bad smell to it. Not sure if it was the packaging or the actual smell of the wipes but they were horrible I had to throw away.
i have rosea and my skin dr recommend it is great. from time to time i have tried other wipes not thw same. i use face cream also

reviews.title: Great makeup remover wipes for sensitive skin!
reviews.review_text: Very happy with these. Remove makeup well and are gentle on the skin. Only downside is the price for how few you get.

reviews.title: Face burns.
reviews.review_text: It removes the makeup which is nice and all but it burns my face. Like literally burns. I've had friends try it and also have burning sensations.
Expensive but I really like them. Will buy again. They hydrate your skin. I am a cerave girl. Love their products
